article_title: Paul Fanlund: It’s time for progressives to get real and get behind Hillary Clinton
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy skies this morning followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 77F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

og.description: The antidote to the nation’s scary GOP is sober realism.
